item.title: RStudio and R Markdown Tips
item.description: Here are some miscellaneous tips for working on RStudio and writing R Markdown file. It will be updated from time to time. See also: RStudio Cheatsheets 1. RStudio 1.1 Re-view generated html file in RStudio If need to view closed html result file, simply run: rstudioapi::viewer("myfile.html") 2. R Markdown 2.1 Show code but not run Add eval=FALSE in chunk option. 2.2 Output data frames as tables Use kable(data, caption):
